meanings.definition: Having only one wife at a time.
meanings.sent1: In some cultures, being monogynous is a common practice.
meanings.sent2: He is a monogynous man, dedicated to his one wife.
meanings.sent3: The monogynous husband always remembers his anniversary.
meanings.sent4: Her monogynous commitment to her partner is unwavering.
meanings.sent5: The concept of being monogynous is deeply rooted in their relationship.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to a species in which each male mates with only one female.
meanings.sent1: The monogynous birds build nests together for their young.
meanings.sent2: In a monogynous species, the male and female form a strong bond.
meanings.sent3: The monogynous animals share parenting duties equally.
meanings.sent4: The monogynous behavior of the species ensures genetic diversity.
meanings.sent5: Witnessing the monogynous pairing in nature is truly fascinating.
